title.rendered: Signature Global City 81 – A Premium Residential Project in Gurgaon

content.rendered:
Signature Global City 81 – A residential project that brings you the best of luxury, convenience and modern living. Situated near Dwarka Expressway in Sector 81, this project spans over 11.9 acres of prime territory and offers meticulously designed premium Independent floors. These Premium independent floors offer a unique living experience with more privacy, spaciousness, and the feeling of living in a standalone home while still enjoying the benefits of community living.



Nestled in Sector 81, an evolving residential destination in the rapidly developing real estate market of New Gurgaon, Signature Global City 81 stands as a testament to the flourishing real estate landscape in the area. With the surge in commercial office spaces and the IT sector, the demand for residential properties in New Gurgaon has skyrocketed, and Sector 81 has emerged as a sought after destination. Renowned developers have created a vibrant community in this sector.


Location Advantage


Connectivity is a key advantage of living in Sector 81. The road infrastructure has witnessed significant improvements, offering seamless connectivity to adjacent sectors such as New Sector Road, Sector 90 Road, and Dwarka Expressway Link Road. The prominent NH-48 is just a stone’s throw away, connecting you effortlessly to Gurgaon and Delhi. Additionally, the nearest Gurgaon railway station is within a 30-40 minute drive.



For professionals seeking employment opportunities, Sector 81 boasts excellent connectivity to nearby employment hubs. Various office and industrial units in Sector 74A, 75A, and 35 are closely connected via NH-48. Major business parks such as Hero Honda Chowk, Sohna Road, UdyogVihar, Golf Course Extension Road and Cyber City can be reached easily. The bustling auto manufacturing hub of Manesar is also a mere 15-minute drive away.


Infrastructural Development


Another key feature of this sector that makes it an ideal residential destination is strong social infrastructure in the neighbourhood. The sector has witnessed development of several top notch residential projects in the vicinity. Residential projects in these places are ideal for those who choose to surround themselves with abundant greenery and soothing sound of nature. Well established network of Schools, Hospitals, Shopping Malls, Retail Markets and Five Star Hotels in the vicinity. The city is very close to the international airport via NH-8 and Dwarka Expressway. This sector is also well connected with the network of proposed metro line.

Built with all specifications of a Green Building Project, Signature Global City 81 enjoys an upscale lifestyle in a modern setting that is in perfect harmony with nature. The prestigious Edge Certification promotes resource-efficient savings, providing the residents with a green and clean environment. While the artistic landscaping and gardens preserve life at its pristine best; the world-class amenities and security services redefine the ultimate in luxurious and comfortable living.


Features of Green Homes

  • Operational energy-saving features
  • Optimum window-to-wall ratio (WWR)
  • Energy Efficient walls
  • Reflective roof
  • High thermal performance windows
  • Water saving features
  • Low flow water fixtures (taps, showerheads)
  • Low flow water closet
  • Rain water harvesting
  • Waste water treatment and reuse
  • Embodied energy saving features
  • Low embodied energy materials (walls, floor and roof slab, flooring and window frames)


If you are looking for premium Low Rise Floors in Gurugram, Signature Global Floors Sector 81 is the perfect investment for you. With its premium quality, luxurious amenities, and prime location, this project is the perfect investment for those who want to experience a comfortable sustainable and luxurious lifestyle. Look no further than Signature Global City 81 for the ultimate builder floor experience in Gurugram.
